actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Department of Agriculture to carry out an emergency assistance program to assist States in relieving severe drought conditions that threaten to destroy livestock or crops.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Department of Agriculture to carry out an emergency assistance program to assist States in relieving severe drought conditions that threaten to destroy livestock or crops. Authorizes to be appropriated from time to time the sums necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Department of Agriculture to carry out an emergency assistance program to assist States in relieving severe drought conditions that threaten to destroy livestock or crops.
